item.description:
This one is for the suburban folks.

The Red Sox Natives are inviting any available Boston Happy Hour members to our First Red Sox Natives Happy Hour of 2010 at Harrington's Food and Spirits in downtown Wakefield. Harrington's is a cozy Irish Restaurant and Pub that offers complimentary appetizers from 5-7pm with a Cash Bar on Thursday nights.


Several other groups including Social Fun and the Skidads are being invited. Feel free to invite your friends and any XXXs of Tiger Woods too.

There is free parking in downtown Wakefield in the public lot across from Harrington's and along Water and Main Streets. The location is T accessible by the 136 and 137 Bus from the Orange Line in Malden Center And Commuter Rail accessible from North Station by the Reading and Haverhill Trains stopping at Wakefield with a less than 10 minute walk up Albion to Main to Water Street.

Please remember to maintain your own bar tab or pay in cash for your beverages.

We will be there until at leat 8pm.

We hope to see you there.
item.name: First Happy Hour of 2010 with the Red Sox Natives at Harrington's Pub
